references.paper_title: Imagenet: A large-scale hierarchical image database
references.reason: This paper is a crucial reference as it introduces the ImageNet dataset, a fundamental benchmark for image recognition and a dataset for the experiments in this study.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This work highlights the ability of diffusion models to surpass the generation abilities of GANs, thus providing a baseline understanding of diffusion models.
This is one of the essential references for diffusion models providing a formal model.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper represents one of the seminal pieces of work in diffusion models.
This paper describes the approach (DiT) upon which this paper builds its Mixture of Experts approach, and therefore the basic framework of the paper in question.
